column4: can someone help me with connetion issues, i have my cat /var/log/syslog | grep NetworkManager >
for some reason it just wont connect.. i have my cat /var/log/syslog | grep NetworkManager > pasted in paste bin
can anyone help me with connection problems
interenet connection issues
is it wifi or wired?
wifi
ok... what chipset ?
do you want to see my paste bin of cat /var/log/syslog | grep NetworkManager >
i have a wusb54gv4 wifi and a 54gs router
URL?
http://pastebin.com/d1cef6397
anything stick out
that could be a problem
so its not doing the wpa authentication... have you tried it on an open wifi connection?
my "linksys" is open... im on my neighbors connection wich seems to work fine and its open as well
did you see anythign that stuck out as being an issue
then its defintely the wpa supplicant causing the issue... might want to seek out wicd ... i would google it ... what i use, but it can have issues with compiz... or so i'm told
i dont follow
also daveyates at lottalinuxlinks recommends it over network manager ... another network manager wicd is
wicd.sf.net
how hard would it be to install and use this
not really
